title: Nami loves you! My boards sticker improved (greatly) by Seras Dragon (OCE), come check it out!
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/5d47553f1bf68dab40491afda165ff42.png

Seras Dragon is an Emissary here on OCE and holy crap she did an amazing job, it looks like the professional stickers from Riot! I requested to commission her for this and she did it over 4 and a half hours using 38 layers for free! [old crappy one here](https://i.gyazo.com/11e92d900bf67cead30900fcef265895.png)

I haven't seemed to inspire anyone to make board stickers of their favorite champions through the [ones](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/dYoX8bgz-sharing-the-nami-stickers-i-have-so-far) I did, but maybe her amazing work here will :D

replies.body:
Classic Seras. Talented one she is. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I thought the heart was a http://images.animalpicturesociety.com/images/02/3_2_amazingly-blue-creatures-blue-footed-booby.jpg x___________x {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} I clicked for nothing xD lol jks

Im  no drawer, but yasuo shaking his head sounds nice, quick Seras.

Can finally shake my head at the people complaining because they got outplayed.
